author: Staff Reporter
text:
A crack on the railway track between Guduvanchery and Urapakkam stations on Thursday evening resulted in delay in the movement of trains.

Sources said the crack was noticed by a motorman of a suburban electric multiple unit (EMU) train. The motorman alerted the railway control room at Tambaram. Engineers and staff rushed to the spot and attended to the fault and services were restored by 8 p.m. Three EMU trains and the Puducherry passenger bound for Egmore were halted at stations between Singaperumal Koil and Guduvanchery.
title: Crack on track delays trains
